content: 1 tanaticrochet crochet pattern plush bat tanaticrochet © 2023 all rights reserved for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sell or free over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern tatiana kucherovska 2 size 22 cm 8 in if using bulky weight yarn bulky 7 wpi 5 bulky and sport weight yarn sport 12 wpi 2 fine s kill level easy material yarn plush - yarnart dolce or vizell baby smile purple 80 g pink 5 g hook 4 5 mm glitter plastic eyes 20 mm soft stuffing scissors pins for sewing the parts at the right spot needle for sewing for the plush yarn abbreviation single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet increase increase decrease decrease chain chain st s stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch blo - crochet this row only in the back loops flo - crochet this row only in the front loops x …… - repeat the instructions in brackets for x the indicated number of times recommendations for you  of course you can choose other yarns the choice of yarn is completely up to you and your personal taste my choice of plush yarn is - vizell baby smile premium baby love himalaya velvet this yarn is softer and thinner than yarn art dolce  work in continuous rounds do not join or turn unless otherwise instructed  it would be wise to use a stitch marker and place it in the first stitch of each round to mark the beginning of it  you can easily sew the toy together by leaving a long tail of yarn on each piece  before you sew a part use some pins to perfectly place the part in the right place tanaticrochet © 2023 all rights reserved for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sell or free over the internet or offline you can sell items made from this pattern tatiana kucherovska 3 head hook 4 5 mm round plush purple yarn sts round sts 1 6 single_crochet into a magic loop 6 insert the eyes in round 13 distance between the 2 increase x 6 12 eyes 8 stitches pic 1-2 3 1 single_crochet increase repeat 6 times 18 gradually add a soft filler 4 2 single_crochet increase repeat 6 times 24 15 5 single_crochet decrease repeat 6 times 36 5 3 single_crochet increase repeat 6 times 30 16 4 single_crochet decrease repeat 6 times 30 6 30 single_crochet 30 17 3 single_crochet decrease repeat 6 times 24 7 4 single_crochet increase repeat 6 times 36 18 2 single_crochet decrease repeat 6 times 18 8 36 single_crochet 36 cut the thread and hide it 9 5 single_crochet increase repeat 6 times 42 10-14 42 single_crochet 5 rounds 42 1 8 sts 2 5 sts gl itter eyes 20
